There are a large number of other software packages out there for building learning modules, documentation or web sites, so what's so great about EClass.Builder?
  • Easy to use interface and short learning curve
  • "Open source", which means all tools are free to use, modify and redistribute
  • Extensible, organizations can modify EClass to support their special data formats and branding
  • Run on Windows, Mac and Linux
  • Based on open data formats and supports open industry standards whenever possible
